(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBG meaning)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB blog)
                (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                  (CC and)
                  (VP (VBP eat))
                  (-RRB- -RRB-))
                (NP (DT this) (NNP Pao))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP (NNS ages)))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(meaning-4, I-1)
aux(meaning-4, have-2)
aux(meaning-4, been-3)
root(ROOT-0, meaning-4)
aux(blog-6, to-5)
xcomp(meaning-4, blog-6)
cc(eat-9, and-8)
dep(blog-6, eat-9)
det(Pao-12, this-11)
dobj(blog-6, Pao-12)
prep(blog-6, for-13)
pobj(for-13, ages-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBD ate)
        (ADVP (RB here))
        (PP
          (ADVP
            (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NNS months))
            (RB back))
          (IN upon)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN recommendation))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP
                (NP (CD one))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (DT the) (NNS forummers)))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBD was)
        (SBAR (RB just) (IN as)
          (S
            (NP (PRP he))
            (VP (VBD described)
              (NP (PRP it)))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(ate-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, ate-2)
advmod(ate-2, here-3)
det(months-6, a-4)
amod(months-6, few-5)
npadvmod(back-7, months-6)
advmod(upon-8, back-7)
prep(ate-2, upon-8)
det(recommendation-10, the-9)
pobj(upon-8, recommendation-10)
prep(recommendation-10, of-11)
pobj(of-11, one-12)
prep(one-12, of-13)
det(forummers-15, the-14)
pobj(of-13, forummers-15)
cc(ate-2, and-16)
nsubj(was-18, it-17)
conj(ate-2, was-18)
advmod(described-22, just-19)
mark(described-22, as-20)
nsubj(described-22, he-21)
advcl(was-18, described-22)
dobj(described-22, it-23)

    (WHADVP (WRB When))
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))

      (, ,))))

  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBD got)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB be)
            (ADJP (RB really) (JJ careful))
            (SBAR (IN because)
              (S
                (NP (DT the) (NNS juices))
                (ADVP (RB simply))
                (VP (VBP flow)
                  (ADVP (IN out) (RB almost))
                  (PP (IN like)
                    (NP (DT a) (NNP Xiao) (NNP Long) (NNP Bao))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT That))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NNS months))
      (SBAR
        (ADVP (RB ago)
          (CC and)
          (RB ever))
        (IN since)
        (S
          (ADVP (RB then))
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBP have)
            (VP (VBN been)
              (ADJP (JJ yearning)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB go)
                      (PRT (RP back))
                      (ADVP (RB again)))))))))))
    (. .)))

            (JJ juicy))))

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP
      (NP (PRP me))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (DT the) (JJ famous) (NNP Tanjong) (NNP Rhu) (NNP Pao))))
    (SBAR (IN except)
      (S
        (NP (DT this))
        (VP (VBD was)
          (ADJP
            (NP
              (QP (IN at) (JJS least) (CD 2) (TO to) (CD 3) (NNS times))
              (JJR bigger))
            (JJ -LRB-)))))))

dep(times-16, to-14)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (CD 1.20) (NNS Those))
      (VP (VBG looking)
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ uncommon)))))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB be)
        (ADJP (JJ pleased)
          (PP (IN with)
            (NP
              (NP (DT this) (NNP Yen) (NNP Yang) (NNP Pao))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WDT which))
                (S
                  (VP (VBZ is)
                    (NP (NNP Lotus) (NNP Paste)))))))
          (, ,))))))

  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NN paste))
    (VP (VBD was)

        (ADJP (JJ sweet)
          (CC and)
          (JJ gooey))
        (CC and)

    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ next) (NN time) (NN I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (ADVP (RB back)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBP plan)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP
                    (VP (VB buy)
                      (NP (CD 10)))
                    (CC and)
                    (VP (VB leave)
                      (NP (PRP it))
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP (DT the) (NN freezer))))))))))))
    (, ,)))

      (NP (PRP it)))
